wikipedia_page.main: Ivan Gerald Haines (born 14 September 1968) is an English former professional footballer who played as a central defender.Born in Chatham, Haines played for Gillingham between 1987 and 1991, making 51 appearances in the Football League.

response: Lovell made the highest number of appearances during the season; he was in the starting line-up for every one of the club's 55 matches.  Pritchard and West also made over 50 appearances, each playing 51 times.  Both players played in every game in the FA Cup, League Cup, and Associate Members' Cup, but each missed four Third Division matches.  Four other players made more than 40 appearances.  Four players, all members of the club's youth team, played only one game each.  Of these, Ian Docker, Ivan Haines and Lee Palmer would all go on to become regulars in the first team, but Neil Luff's single appearance as a substitute would prove to be the only game of his professional career.
